attributes.action: Stop parlement considering having a 2nd, 3rd or 4th referendum on EU membership.
attributes.background: When we vote our votes should count! If we don't like the result do we go to the streets to protest that it didn't go our way? No, because we live in a democracy and we have to stand by and accept the majority vote. If our vote is not counted what's the point in voting? I thought I lived in the UK.
